root.name: Gunslinger
root.description: When announced in 2000, Gunslinger was set to be one of the first console games focused on morality choices that would be presented to the player throughout the adventure. These choices would affect the outcome of the game with its various branching story lines. The title was shown at E3 2000 by Activision, but in the Summer of 2001, rights to the game were transferred to Sony and Gunslinger was given a late 2002 release date. The game was later canceled for unknown reasons.
